'''Mysterious Stone Slates''' are [[Quest Item]]s used for the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Murals of Gurabad]]''.

==Types==
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (I)}}
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (II)}}
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (III)}}
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (IV)}}
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (V)}}
* {{Item|Mysterious Stone Slate (VI)}}

==Trivia==

*The letters on the Mysterious Stone Slates spell, in order, SAHMAT, from {{Lang|''Sahmat''|fa=شاه مات}}, meaning "checkmate", likely in reference to the doors they open being near [[Safhe Shatranj]], which is Persian for "chessboard".
